text: If sharks were men, they would build huge boxes for small fish in the sea, with all kinds of food inside, both plants and animal matter. They would worry about the containers always having fresh water and would take all sorts of health measures. If, for example, a pig damages an anthill, they would then sell it so that it would not be killed prematurely. To make the fishes not sad, sometimes when they organize big water parties, because the fishes that are green have better taste than the sad ones. FIN
title: Si los tiburones fueran hombres I
author: Bertolt Brecht
